usage.cn: 从来没有人可以取代你。
你比你所想象的要可爱漂亮得多。
usage.eng: You are more lovely than you could ever imagine.

usage.cn: 听说幸福很简单。简单到时间一冲就冲淡。
usage.eng: heard that it is very easy to be happy, as could be diluted with time going on.

usage.cn: 听说幸福很简单。简单到时间一冲就冲淡。
usage.eng: I heard that it is very easy to be happy, as could be diluted with time going on.
